de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.random

Class RandomFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.random.RandomFactory

  • public class RandomFactory
extends Object
    RandomFactory is responsible for creating Random generator objects. It does not provide individual random numbers, but will create a random generator; either using a fixed seed or random seeded (default). TODO: allow global fixing of seed, to make whole experiments reproducible, without having to set every single seed.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
